mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sec_user (id, phone, password, name, letter, icon, gender, regTime, lastLoginTime, isSetPwd) VALUES ( #{id}, #{phone}, #{password}, #{name}, #{letter}, #{icon}, #{gender}, now(), now(), #{isSetPwd})
mapper.select: SELECT u.*, a.id as aid, a.idNo, a.ext, a.actionTime, a.createTime, a.state as astate, a.actionId ,a.name as aname, a.gender as agender, a.reason FROM sec_user u LEFT JOIN sec_user_auth a on u.id = a.userId WHERE u.id = #{id}

SELECT u.*, a.id as aid, a.idNo, a.ext, a.actionTime, a.createTime, a.state as astate, a.actionId ,a.name as aname, a.gender as agender, a.reason FROM sec_user u LEFT JOIN sec_user_auth a on u.id = a.userId WHERE u.phone = #{phone}

SELECT u.*, a.id as aid, a.idNo, a.ext, a.actionTime, a.createTime, a.state as astate, a.actionId ,a.name as aname, a.gender as agender, a.reason FROM sec_user u LEFT JOIN sec_user_auth a on u.id = a.userId WHERE u.id = #{id}

SELECT u.*, a.id as aid, a.idNo, a.ext, a.actionTime, a.createTime, a.state as astate, a.actionId ,a.name as aname, a.gender as agender, a.reason FROM sec_user u left join sec_user_third t on u.id = t.userId LEFT JOIN sec_user_auth a on u.id = a.userId WHERE t.openid = #{openid}
mapper.update: UPDATE sec_user SET lastLoginTime = now() WHERE id = #{id};
UPDATE user SET password = #{password}, updateTime = now() WHERE uid = #{uid};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sec_user_third (userId, type, openId, bindTime, loginType) VALUES (#{userId}, #{type}, #{openId}, now(), #{loginType})
